channel.title: How to Change the Stats and How to Make an Item go as a shield
channel.description:
Urrm.. Well hi im Linkey and I need help making stats on items and making items go into different placees like shield, weapon, arrow, legs, chest and stuff like that. So if you could help reply to me or send me a private message.
Thanks, -- Linkey (Bloody4 FTW)

item.title: How to Change the Stats and How to Make an Item go as a shield
